<font color="red"> Registration are now opened  </font>

Registration fee:

- **Early fee registration**: 126 euros TTC. [For Early fee registration](https://paiement-colloques.univ-pau.fr/cgi-bin/pbox.py?seminar=ANGLETR2017&total=126)
- **Late registration** (after Mai 15 2017): 180 euros TTC [For late registration](https://paiement-colloques.univ-pau.fr/cgi-bin/pbox.py?seminar=ANGLETR2017&total=180)
- **Student fee**: 90 euros TTC. [For student](https://paiement-colloques.univ-pau.fr/cgi-bin/pbox.py?seminar=ANGLETR2017&total=90)

It is also possible to register using a ``order form'', for it you should contact Bruno Demoisy (<bruno.demoisy@univ-pau.fr>, 05 59 40 74 32).


This fee allows to participate in the various talks sessions. It also covers the coffee breaks  lunch on Thursday and Friday as well as the buffet supper on Thursday evening.
